app_description: Ultimate Fast and Powerful TALKING Dictionary and Translator English Persian Farsi Persian English LISTEN AND LEARN ENGLISH WITH WORDS PRONUNCIATIONS PREMIUM TEXT TRANSLATION FARSI ENGLISH ENGLISH FARSI Your best assistant if you need to tell something to other people in opposite language Text To Speech Support Easy to use Including over 380 000 words. Over 20 specific categories Open Dictionary Support Suggesting and downloading latest set of words Intelligent relative words navigation Designed for iPhone 5 6 7 8 New iPhone X support Designed for iPad iPad Air iPad Pro Optimized for Retina Display Landscape Portrait view mode support iPad Split view support Intelligent translation without need to set input language Presents Word of A Day feature to help you memorize new words Disclaimer: THE TRANSLATION FEATURE IS PROVIDED BY PREMIUM ONLINE TRANSLATE SERVICE SO THE ACCURACY OF THE TRANSLATION RESULT IS NOT GUARANTEED BY THIS APP. NONE OF MACHINE TRANSLATION SYSTEM IN THE WORLD ARE 100 ACCURATE BUT WE DO OUR BEST TO INTEGRATE THE MOST POWERFULL ONES IN OUR APP
